name: BE IN BED
description:
Game Introduction:

This is a leisure game. Players need to turn off the vibrating mobile phone and adjust the music volume to eliminate their troubles. The original intention of this game is to tell people the main reasons that affect sleep and how to better improve their sleep quality.

Game Control:

When the mobile phone vibrates, you need to click to close it with the mouse to make it return to the black screen state. If it is not closed in time, the mobile phone will make a louder sound and the game is over.

When the level of worry is 1, press keyboard A to adjust the volume to the first level

When the level of worry is 2, press the keyboard S to adjust the volume to the second level

When the level of worry is 3, press keyboard D to adjust the volume to the third level

When the level of worry is 4, the game ends
